actions.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 108-784, by Mrs. Myrick.
Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 256.

official_title: Waiving a requirement of clause 6(a) of rule XIII with respect to consideration of certain resolutions reported from the Committee on Rules.

summary.text: Waives a specified requirement of rule XIII to provide for consideration or disposition of the conference report on H.R. 4548 (Intelligence Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2005).

titles.title: Waiving a requirement of clause 6(a) of rule XIII with respect to consideration of certain resolutions reported from the Committee on Rules.
